clinical_history: Thyroid swelling and suspected nodular disease.
findings: Thyroid gland shows homogeneous echotexture; no suspicious nodules.
Prostate is hyperechoic; volume approximately 28.21 cc.
Breast tissue shows coarse lesion measuring 5.95 mm.
Urinary bladder is mildly thickened, no intraluminal lesions.
Fetal cardiac activity present with FHR 30.16 bpm.
Major vessels show well-defined waveform on Doppler.
recommendations: Refer to specialist for further evaluation.
